name: Today's Sales
query:
SELECT
    DAYNAME(curdate()) AS "Today",
    COUNT(b.`name`) AS "Total Invoices",
    SUM(b.`net_total`) AS "Item Total",
    SUM(b.`grand_total` - b.`net_total`) AS "GST",
    SUM(b.`grand_total`) AS "Grand Total",
    SUM(b.`grand_total` - b.`rounded_total`) AS "Round Off",
    SUM(b.`rounded_total` - b.`paid_amount` + b.`change_amount`) AS "Cash Discounts"
FROM `tabPOS Invoice` b
LEFT JOIN `tabURY Report Settings` rs ON (
    rs.`branch` = %(branch)s
)
WHERE 
    b.`branch` = %(branch)s
    AND
    (
        ((rs.`hours` IS NULL OR rs.`hours` = 0) AND b.`posting_date` = curdate())
        OR (rs.`hours` > 0 AND TIMESTAMP(b.`posting_date`, b.`posting_time`) <= TIMESTAMP(DATE_ADD(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 DAY), CONCAT(LPAD(rs.`hours`, 2, '0'), ':00:00')) AND TIMESTAMP(b.`posting_date`, b.`posting_time`) >= TIMESTAMP(curdate(), CONCAT(LPAD(rs.`hours`, 2, '0'), ':00:00')))
        OR (rs.`branch` IS NULL AND b.`posting_date` = curdate())
    )
    AND b.`status` IN ("Consolidated", "Paid") 
    AND b.`docstatus` = 1
